findings.title: State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: State variables can be declared as constant using the constant keyword to ensure that the value of the state variable cannot be changed after it has been set.

findings.title: Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The contract does not adhere to the Solidity style guide for naming conventions, which can affect code readability and maintainability.

findings.title: Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: The contract performs operations on variables that have been configured based on user-supplied input without proper checks for zero values.
